ComicInfo.Summary:
Angelina and Damiano decide it’s time to tie the knot! But with angel parents on one side, and devils on the other, you know it’s not exactly going to go smoothly. It is, however, going to be very entertaining...and very funny! See what happens when these two unlikely lovebirds get hitched in Mirka Andolfo’s Un/Sacred.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Mirka Andolfo | 1 | B | Cover B | Elias Chatzoudis | 3 | C | Cover C | Jon Lam | 4 | D | Locandina Homage Cover D | Mirka Andolfo | 5 | E | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Sparkle Foil Locandina Homage Variant Cover | Mirka Andolfo | 2 |
